channel.title: Haskell on Emain Ablach
channel.description: Recent content in Haskell on Emain Ablach

item.title: Set up haskell-ide-engine and xmonad
item.description: Now that I have tons of time during this break, I decided to learn myself a haskell and as a way to apply what I’ve learned, I’ve planed to switch from awesomeWM to xmonad. Besides, I’ve being troubled with my awesome config’s memory leak, which I haven’t got the chance to look deeply into, so this might be a good chance to give xmonad a try. However, it spent me a while figuring out how to set the dev environment for xmonad.
